original_title: Ballers: Street Dreams of the Rich and Famous
overview: Hip-hop may be made in the studio, but the deals happen in offices and boardrooms, as witnessed in this candid documentary from producers Tony Dofat and Heavy D. With unprecedented access, their cameras follow some of the genre's biggest names. Interviews with Timbaland, Russell Simmons, P. Diddy, Method Man and others reveal the true story behind the creative process and the decisions that shape the industry.
title: Ballers: Street Dreams of the Rich and Famous
